# Southside Community Food Pantry

## IMPORTANT NOTICE

**Our food pantry is temporarily closed effective January 15, 2025 due to building renovations. We apologize for the inconvenience.**

We expect to reopen in Spring 2025. For immediate food assistance, please contact:
- Atlanta Community Food Bank: (404) 555-0300
- Open Door Pantry: (404) 555-0310

---

## Regular Hours (when open)
~~Monday - Wednesday: 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM~~
~~Friday: 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM~~

## Location
1200 Metropolitan Pkwy SW, Atlanta, GA 30310

## Requirements
- Must reside in zip codes 30310, 30311, 30312, 30313, or 30315
- Bring a piece of mail showing your current address
- Limit: 2 visits per month per household

## Last Updated: January 10, 2025
